sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 815.03 Definitions.—As used in this chapter, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise:

sections.heading: Offenses against users of computers, computer systems, computer networks, and electronic devices.
sections.text: against users of computers, computer systems, computer networks, and electronic devices.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise:(1)“Access” means to approach, instruct, communicate with, store data in, retrieve data from, or otherwise make use of any resources of a computer, a computer system, a computer network, or an electronic device
